Articles.Content:
Fuse two things to make one interesting and potentially awesome thing.

Here, I have fused a spaceplane and a Munar rover. Hilarity ensues.

You get the idea. What strange machines can you make?

Interestingness [by public decision]

1

2

3

4

5
one Robotic power walker coming up!
Imma make a plane-boat-carthingy...sounds reasonable to do

A flying boat?

It\'s awesome, but I don\'t know how 'interesting' it is.
Tim,that thing is big and huge and all, but it is getting old. I mean, it is half-rusted right now! You need a new flying boat! (Yours is absurdly awesome, but posted in most challenges like this.)

May I enter a craft from a previous challenge?

Liked the powerslide at the beginning of your video RedDwarf, I thought you\'d see it through and demolish your base. Must have been tricky to fly it out there too...

Yes, you can enter it. Though presumably, the more contests you have entered it in, the less interesting it will seem, as pointed out by Imandreas.

Not that tricky. It has Mechjeb, and it landed on top if the base.

Another one I landed nearby wasn\'t so lucky. It happily landed, and I drove it to Werewolf base, but it failed to stop. The base was knocked over to a 45* angle, and the shuttle broke in half. Strangely though, despite looking seriously overbalanced, the forward half could still rove around.

Fair point from both of you, hence a new video! Hope you all enjoy the HeliTruckter.

http://youtu.be/n9wh6QllN3I

Not that tricky. It has Mechjeb, and it landed on top if the base.

Another one I landed nearby wasn\'t so lucky. It happily landed, and I drove it to Werewolf base, but it failed to stop. The base was knocked over to a 45* angle, and the shuttle broke in half. Strangely though, despite looking seriously overbalanced, the forward half could still rove around.

I sometimes forget how easy MechJeb makes things these days. I still haven\'t taken a spaceplane out of LKO, I\'ll have to give that a whirl sometime. That crash sounds like one of those 'oh ****' moments when you realise you should have started braking/turning/something a LOT earlier.
Fair point. It\'s just that KSP won\'t let me building anything much bigger with that many parts without killing my computer.

Fair point. It\'s just that KSP won\'t let me building anything much bigger with that many parts without killing my computer.

I think your battleship would sink my CPU pretty damn easily. Out of interest what setup are you using?
